Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Taste of Life S1 Ep260
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go S1 Ep3317
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan S1 Ep64
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Chef's Unexpected Landing: Hakka Kitchen 2 2 S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Chefs Unexpected Landing: Hakka Kitchen 2 unites Leeteuk, James, and a lineup of Korean and Taiwanese celebrities to create inventive Hakka-Korean fusion dishes. Using traditional Hakka ingredients with Korean flavours, the team tests their creations through pop-ups and food trucks in Korea. 2

programme.title: Girls Tease S1 Ep32
programme.desc: This show focuses on the issues that are most important to urban modern women. It combines current events with discussions of life's major and minor problems and invites various specialists to address various difficulties. Netizens will occasionally attend the show to share their own stories and ask questions of the guests and experts, making the topics more relevant and audience-focused!

programme.title: Top Singers S1 Ep693
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz S1 Ep1102
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Just for You S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Two brothers, living just 300 meters apart, lead vastly different lives. The elder, Kai-Teng Chiao, a former athlete turned plumber, gave up his dreams to support his family and finds unexpected healing through a connection with a distant, cold-hearted prosecutor. Meanwhile, the younger, Hsi-Ming Chiao, a successful lawyer, is forced to confront the painful past he buried, which includes his breakup and his fathers suicide, when he meets Pao-Chi Hsu, the woman who holds the key to the memories he lost a decade ago.

programme.title: Customs Frontline
programme.desc: After boarding an unauthorized cargo ship and finding its entire crew dead, the Hong Kong Customs officers uncover a hidden cache of illegal weapons linked to an international conflict. As Customs officer Zhou Zheng Li and Interpol's Ying go undercover, they unveil a multinational operation with ties closer to home.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva's mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother's wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva's heart?

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earth's surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Xiao Fei is a cheerful girl who has been abandoned by her mother. One day, she encounters a gifted young man named Zi Wai, who is battling a rare disease. Determined to help him, she embarks on a journey to find his lost love. Even when they discover that the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: The Ex-files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: God Of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers", clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: All U Need Is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk and Chief Inspector Lau both hit a dead end when investigating their respective bribery and money laundering cases. When Luk is accused of bribery after being framed by the money launderers, he risks everything he has to find crucial evidence against them to clear his name.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: No One Like Me
programme.desc: Yang Qian Huan, the third disciple of the Imperial Astronomer, was once a golden boy. However, since the birth of Xu Qi An, his glory has waned. His relentless pursuit cannot defy a merciless truth: all has been foretold. Yet rising from his downfall, Yang defiantly forges his own path, refusing to bow to fate.

programme.title: Stuntman
programme.desc: Washed-up stunt director Li Sen is offered the role of action choreographer on his director friend's final film. Bringing along an ambitious young stuntman, the two generations risk everything to stage a comeback. As Li Sen battles his fierce temper and past mistakes, he also strives to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his son's talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: The sequel to "Table for Six", Bernard and Lung plan to get married while their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for everyone involved.

programme.title: A Legend
programme.desc: Archaeologist Professor Fang uncovers artifacts from a glacier expedition that resembles a jade pendant in his dream. To unveil the truth, Professor Fang leads his team to a journey into the glacier, embarking on a fantastical adventure together.

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tian's daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: The Last Tycoon
programme.desc: Gangster Chen Da Qi rises to the upper echelons of power, but finds himself torn between the love of two women, the murderous plots of the secret service, and the looming threat of war.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government's secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor's ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: The story revolves around three lay disciples of the Shaolin Temple: Fang Shi Yu, Hong Xi Guan, and Hu Hui Qian. Monk Jie instructs them in martial arts, but their frequent competitions with fellow disciple Wu Qing spark rivalries. The once serene Shaolin Temple is plunged into chaos, yet even the abbot cannot help but be amused by their antics.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hong escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hong for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hong escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider's look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang's popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: After avenging his father's death by assassinating a high official, Li Yue disappears into hiding as a fugitive. His fiance enlists a swordsmanwho secretly loves herto search for him, unaware that the bandit Xiao Mei has also fallen for Li Yue. Their intertwined love quadrangle explores themes of sacrifice, devotion and selfless love.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong's hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat's knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate's daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son's arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu skill from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in a fight between the Qing and Ming camps along the way, and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper's daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content, yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Honey Bunny Ka Jholmaal S1 Ep24
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.title: The Legend Of Tarzan (2016) S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Legend Of Tarzan - A new live-action adventure from director David Yates (Harry Potter films) brings Edgar Rice Burroughs' legendary character back to the big screen. It's been years since the man once known as Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgard --True Blood) left the jungles of Africa behind for a gentrified life as John Clayton III, Lord Greystoke, with his beloved wife, Jane (Margot Robbie -- The Wolf of Wall Street) at his side. Now, he has been invited back to the Congo to serve as a trade emissary of Parliament, unaware that he is a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed and revenge, masterminded by the Belgian, Captain Leon Rom (Oscar winner Christoph Waltz). But those behind the murderous plot have no idea what they are about to unleash.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor "Sully" Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago by the House of Moncada.

programme.title: HELLBOY
programme.desc: This supernatural action-adventure is based on Mike Mignola's acclaimed Dark Horse Comics series. Brought to Earth by evil genius Rasputin (Karel Roden) to aid the Nazis in their dying cause, Hellboy (Ron Perlman) was rescued by Professor Broom (John Hurt), founder of the clandestine B.P.R.D. (Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic mer-man (Doug Jones) and a pyro-kinetic (Selma Blair). Hidden from the society they are assigned to protect, they are the key line of defense against Rasputin, who seeks to reclaim Hellboy to the dark side and use his powers to bring about Armageddon.

programme.title: ROOKIE, THE S7 Ep6
programme.desc: The Gala - It's Valentine's Day, and Lieutenant Grey gives Tim and Lucy an unromantic assignment, while John and Celina track down a missing girl. Later, the team sharpens up for a charity gala where multiple relationships come to a head.

programme.title: HUDSON & REX S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Double Dog Dare - When a murder investigation devolves into a kidnapping, Rex's nose leads him and Charlie to Bell Island - and right into the middle of a double murder plot.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Out Of Time - After the officers of 15 Division are forced to release a suspected predator, the grim discovery of the body of a missing girl reopens an unsolved case -bringing back Detective Luke Callaghan in from the Homicide Squad to oversee it. But when they learn that Andy has been assaulted, and Gail Peck has been violently abducted following the call-girl sting, its a race against time as the officers of 15 Division work frantically to recover one of their own.

programme.title: DOC S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Must Come Down - A mass casualty event requires all hands-on deck at Westside Hospital. Amidst the chaos, Gina deals with a devastating revelation and Amy's forced to confront her demons.

programme.title: ROOKIE, THE S7 Ep6
programme.desc: The Gala - It's Valentine's Day, and Lieutenant Grey gives Tim and Lucy an unromantic assignment, while John and Celina track down a missing girl. Later, the team sharpens up for a charity gala where multiple relationships come to a head.

programme.title: HUDSON & REX S7 Ep2
programme.desc: A Room with a Clue - With the rest of the team racing to stop an illicit weapons sale, Rex resolves to bring justice all on his own when he witnesses a murder while stuck at home.

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Who By Fire - When the body of a college swimmer washes up on the beach, the team must determine if it was an accident or murder. Also, Gibbs prepares for his first interrogation.

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED S6 Ep3
programme.desc: White Buffalo - After a simple act of defiance by a couple of young climate activists goes south, the Fugitive Task Force works to hunt them down before their plans take a devastating turn.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Surprises - After six months working undercover, Andy and Nick's operation goes sideways when Nick -then Andy -go missing. Meanwhile, a random arrest at 15 Division puts Sam Swarek and the other officers in the middle of the investigation-turned-rescue-mission.

programme.title: ROOKIE, THE S7 Ep7
programme.desc: The Mickey - On Celina's last day as a rookie, John gives her one final test. Meanwhile, Bailey makes a new friend, and Lucy places her faith in Seth for an undercover assignment.

programme.title: KARATE KID: LEGENDS
programme.desc: Karate Kid: Legends unites the iconic martial arts masters of one of the most beloved film franchises of all time to tell a completely new story full of action and heart. When kung fu prodigy Li Fong (Ben Wang) relocates to New York City with his mother to attend a prestigious new school, he finds solace in a new friendship with a classmate and her father. But his newfound peace is short-lived after he attracts unwanted attention from a formidable local karate champion. Driven by a desire to defend himself, Li embarks on a journey to enter the ultimate karate competition. Guided by the wisdom of his kung fu teacher, Mr. Han (Jackie Chan), and the legendary Karate Kid, Daniel LaRusso (Ralph Macchio), Li merges their unique styles to prepare for an epic martial arts showdown.

programme.title: I KNOW WHAT YOU DID LAST SUMMER
programme.desc: When five friends inadvertently cause a deadly car accident, they cover up their involvement and make a pact to keep it a secret rather than face the consequences. A year later, their past comes back to haunt them and they're forced to confront a horrifying truth: someone knows what they did last summer...and is hell-bent on revenge. As one by one the friends are stalked by a killer, they discover this has happened before, and they turn to two survivors of the legendary Southport Massacre of 1997 for help.

The town is now in the grip of a nyandemic and is filled with adorable cats, and Kunagi, Kaoru, and Tanishi don't even have time to say goodbye to Gaku as they need to search for a safe place. They manage to escape to a supermarket, where they run into Kaoru's classmate Tsutsumi.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival, meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Identical twins - a musician living in New York, and a mechanic living in Hong Kong - are separated in childhood but are unexpectedly reunited years later when the musician travels to Hong Kong for a concert.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: Smurfette and her friends go to the Forbidden Forest to find a lost village. When the evil wizard Gargamel gets to know of this, he devises a plan to stop the smurfs from discovering the town.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: A grumpy widower forms an unlikely friendship with his new neighbors that turns his world around.

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro
programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: In a world where magic is waning and technology prevails, 15-year-old Jennifer Strange runs a magician employment agency and discovers the last dragon is being hunted.

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgement Day
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger reprises his career-changing role as the Terminator in this explosive film that was selected as one of AFI's Top Ten Sci-Fi films of all time.

programme.title: The Man With The Iron Fists
programme.desc: RZA co-writes, directs, and stars in this genre-blending, hip-hop-infused kung fu film set in Hong Kong, featuring Russell Crowe, Lucy Liu, and produced by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: In Wanted, a slacker is recruited by a secret assassin fraternity, uncovering hidden powers and dark truths as he trains under elite killers, including Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Universal Soldier
programme.desc: Two soldiers killed in Vietnam are revived years later as cyborg super-soldiers. But when memories return, they break freesetting up a brutal showdown between former comrades.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Before Snow White, two queens clash in The Huntsman: Winter's War. Love, betrayal, and war unfold as Huntsman Eric battles evil to save a kingdom from Ravenna's dark reign.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and crew face a deadly new enemyDeckard Shawseeking revenge in this high-octane chapter of the Fast & Furious saga. Action explodes as the team fights to protect their own.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: In 2084, construction worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall for a virtual Mars vacationbut the procedure unlocks hidden memories, thrusting him into a deadly rebellion and a secret-agent past.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Chris joins his girlfriend Rose for a weekend at her family's estate. At first, their warm welcome seems like awkwardness about their interracial relationshipuntil disturbing truths emerge.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Robin Hood in Ridley Scott's epic reimaginingfighting corruption and sparking a rebellion that turns a humble outlaw into a timeless symbol of freedom.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this John Woo action thriller where a man battles a deadly group that hunts humans for sport. Also features Lance Henriksen and Wilford Brimley.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: Katniss Everdeen has returned home safe after winning the 74th Annual Hunger Games. She senses that a rebellion is simmering, but the Capitol is still very much in control as the next Hunger Games is prepareda competition that could change Panem forever.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Seasonal Shores - Strap in for a thrilling ride as Lizzie travels by air, land, and sea to meet Alaskan wildlife and visit the world's remotest corners. Eavesdrop on underwater Arctic residents with scientists, dine with polar bears, and scavenge with bald eagles.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Wild West - Trek through the Canadian rainforest, look up at dizzying redwood trees, and explore giant kelp forests with Lizzie as she experiences the wild west coast of North America. Cross paths with wolves and bears while salmon travel upstream to lay eggs.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand's Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Back to School - Start a promising new term at the Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo. See newbie Bumi struggle to focus, track skittish Rumba's first timid steps toward independence, and cheer on star student Valentino as he experiences a bumpy start to college.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Class Reunion - Follow new graduate Beni, who gets an exciting introduction to jungle college alongside former classmates Sura, Meryl, and Wine. Check on new arrival Molly and join Dr. Nadine as she grades slowpoke Bumi and wild child Monita on their latest lessons.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers' dogs.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Catching Air - Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcon's speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Flight Meals - Go hunting with flyers who excel at making mid-air catches. Watch the metamorphosis of the acrobatic emperor dragonfly, admire the barn owl's stealthy approach to prey, and catch a wandering salamander's death-defying leap into the abyss.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tsiba's New Mum - Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope's tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand's South Island, where one of the world's longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Catching Air - Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcon's speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Flight Meals - Go hunting with flyers who excel at making mid-air catches. Watch the metamorphosis of the acrobatic emperor dragonfly, admire the barn owl's stealthy approach to prey, and catch a wandering salamander's death-defying leap into the abyss.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tsiba's New Mum - Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope's tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Back to School - Start a promising new term at the Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo. See newbie Bumi struggle to focus, track skittish Rumba's first timid steps toward independence, and cheer on star student Valentino as he experiences a bumpy start to college.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family - Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the Extreme - Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Catching Air - Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcon's speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand's South Island, where one of the world's longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Catching Air - Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcon's speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Flight Meals - Go hunting with flyers who excel at making mid-air catches. Watch the metamorphosis of the acrobatic emperor dragonfly, admire the barn owl's stealthy approach to prey, and catch a wandering salamander's death-defying leap into the abyss.

programme.title: Baby Animals S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Family Ties - The animal kingdom can be cold and unforgiving, but for baby baboons, penguins, capybaras, and emperor tamarins, having a helpful family makes life a little easier.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Place in the Wild - Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya's rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mob Rules - The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo S1 Ep2
programme.desc: From Pouch to Foot - Eastern Grey kangaroos are prolific breeders, but bringing up baby is fraught with challenges. Predators, climate extremes, and lively joeys mean kangaroo mothers face a daily struggle to keep their young alive.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Buck's Life - Follow several different males as they roam the land, climb up the social ladder, and fight for their mating rights in Eastern Grey colony. For these bucks, the drive to perpetuate their species promises a life full of risk and reward.

programme.title: Wild Birds Of Australia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Little Penguin - Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wild Birds Of Australia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Emu - The Emu is Australia's biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Big Move - The Lilayi Elephant Nursery near Lusaka in Zambia is home to four orphan elephants. The two oldest, four-year- olds Musolole and Zambezi, have been here since they were just a few months old. These boisterous babies are out-growing the nursery and it's time to move to big school. Two hundred miles away, in the heart of Kafue National Park, lies elephant heaven - Camp Phoenix, the project's release facility, where older orphans are already adapting to life in the wild.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can't see, sound we can't hear and even stranger forces we can't begin to detect.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte's tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep2
programme.desc: An Island Home - Face a tough decision when Esti's leg infection puts the brakes on this young duiker's release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda, check on an ailing bush baby, and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers' dogs.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tsiba's New Mum - Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope's tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: January-February - the Year Begins - In the early months of the year, the Earth's axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: July-August - a Time of Migration - Witness some of the planet's most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico's forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Nigella's Amsterdam Christmas
programme.desc: Nigella travels to Amsterdam to enjoy the festivities in the Venice of the North. Nigella visits her favourite places, picks up ingredients for her festive feast and makes traditional Dutch speculaas.

programme.title: Jamie's Cook Ahead Christmas S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Jamie kicks off Christmas cooking with dishes we can cook ahead of time. Starting in the weeks before with a vegan base gravy, a beautiful stuffing, an epic veg pie and a decadent dessert - all ready in the freezer as the perfect gift to ourselves!

programme.title: Jamie's Cook Ahead Christmas S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jamie's get-ahead Christmas reaches the days and night before with a silky chicken liver pate starter, a genius new way to cook the turkey, an epic Yorkshire pudding and the best roasties ever, all prepped ahead of time for a no-stress Christmas day!

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Semi-Finals - With just 4 bakers left in the competition, the pressure has ramped up once again with patisserie week, including bombe, and a difficult bake reportedly dedicated to the patron saint of baking. For the Showstopper, the bakers are required to make elaborate entremet, complete with mirror glaze and accompanying macarons.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S6 Ep3
programme.desc: Six Senses Ibiza - Rob Rinder and Monica Galetti work at a luxury hotel in Ibiza where cutting edge biohacking therapies are offered alongside cacao ceremonies.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 6 - Gemini and James had it all planned out when they bought their three-bed home in Surrey. Expecting a new baby, they would move in and do the place up.

programme.title: Nadiya's Family Favourites S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Nothing in the House - Nadiya Hussain creates dishes for those 'Nothing in the House Days', visits a herb garden with spice expert Roopa and meets Lynn, homemade pasta fanatic in Derby.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Christmas Special - A festive ending to the series, Gino uncovers the tasty food and Christmas traditions the South of Italy has to offer. He visits Scolastica Market in Bari to pick up some local ingredients with which to cook the perfect Italian Christmas feast.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Julie and Toby's Castle Turret - Simon's team is in Warwickshire to turn a 200-year-old turret into a medieval-themed B&B. The tiny two-floored building may look like a turret on the outside, but on the inside it's a bland office.

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep10
programme.desc: Northamptonshire - In Northamptonshire, Adam and Tassy convert a 20-metre-high water tower into a fun family home with curved walls, slides, secret rooms, a firefighter's pole, a swimming pool and a sky garden

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gallipoli - Gino is in the city of Gallipoli. He joins a diver on her small boat as they head to the sea caves. She forages for red oysters which they eat with a glass of rose. Gino heads into town and tries out Scapece, a dish of fish in saffron and of religious significance in the city. Inspired by the the saffron and fresh fish, Gino demonstrates the Puglian classic Tiella, the Italian answer to paella, made with mussels, rice and potatoes.

programme.title: Guillaume's Paris S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Chef Guillaume Brahimi checks out the 17th and 18th arrondissements of Paris, where he explores a mushroom farm in an underground car park.

programme.desc: As the year draws to a close Jamie celebrates hearty dishes made with seasonal produce as we move into winter. This episode showcases what needs to be picked, stored and pickled.

A short distance away, Rick joins a small army of seaweed harvesters who are feeding an increasing appetite for a natural food more common in Japan.

programme.desc: Home Punch Home - Tired of the farm's feud with the neighboring punch monkeys, Ugga arranges a punch summit where the Bettermans and Croods will stay in the punch monkey village to learn how to all get along.

programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 1 - Tom and Thunder discover a baby Nightlight and must bring him back to Thunder's home realm.

programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 2 - When Thunder's clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

programme.desc: Cold Open - Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Parental Stridence - When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Flopping of the Bullruses - Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Remote Control - Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he's been missing - real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Cold Open - Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Uncharted Territory - Alex and Eugene find themselves at odds with Tom and their fellow dragon riders when Feathers and Webmaster go missing during a blizzard in the Ice Realm.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Journey to the Snowcano - Jun struggles to convince Tom to trust her faith in myths over the Book of Dragons when they venture to a place that his book seems to say is extremely dangerous.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Stryke Out - Hiccup and Toothless are captured and must find a way to escape the Dragon Fighting arena and survive an attack from the fearsome Triple Stryke dragon.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Tone Death - After the Riders save a Deathsong egg from the Dragon Hunters, they must take it back to Melody Island when the hatched baby won't stop crying.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 Ep37
programme.desc: The Voltron Show! - With the Galra empire in upheaval Team Voltron realizes that now is the time to unite the galaxy and bring the fight to Zarkon

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Bait With Destiny , Sappy Together - Eep gets jealous when Thunk is invited to join the hunters/Grug and Gran must work together after getting stuck to each other with sticky tree sap

programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Fixers - Raa Raas friends help him to fix lots of broken things around the Jingly Jangly Jungle.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jingly Jungle Show - Raa Raa and his friends put on a Jungle show but with everyone performing on stage who will watch it

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Gym - An over enthusiastic Raa Raa breaks Pias new Jungle Gym but he manages to fix it so everyone can have a turn.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Drip Drop Waterfall - The waterfall has lost its tinkly tonk sound so Raa Raa and his friends set out to find it.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Snow Dog, Snow! - When Tag and Scooch learn that Sandra Paws' sleigh broke down on a mountain, they have to go on an adventure to fix the sleigh and save Sniffs-mas! Meanwhile, Beans tries to get a grumpy Frank to feel the Sniffs-mas spirit.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays - Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Spirit Of Christmas - Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin's time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn't work quite how they'd hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it's gone forever!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.desc: The Battle - Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Ah! My Beautiful Castle / The Sand Is Running Away - During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Moon Cow / Nebulator / Space Bug - Tim, Tommy & Tia find a lost toy and vow to return it to its owner. Kai is super excited to ride the Nebulator, but Tim isn't so sure. Tim and Kai try to photograph the illusive SpaceBug.

programme.title: DORA S4 Ep405
programme.desc: Dora & Diego Rescue Baby Jaguar / Diego's Awesome Owl Adventure - Dora, Boots, and Diego rescue a baby jaguar after it gets lost deep in the rainforest. Dora, Boots, and Diego help a baby burrowing owl find its parents and make it home.

programme.title: DORA S4 Ep404
programme.desc: The Missing Magical Instruments / Mr. Banana's Big Puppet Show - Dora, Boots, and Vicky the Vicua track down missing magic instruments to save Cloud Kingdom! Dora rescues Boots' special banana puppet before the Golden Monkeys can get to it!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Best Finemies / Dinner with Bentley - When Baby and Shadow accidentally break a music box, the two unlikely partners team up to fix it. The Sharks turn their home into a fancy restaurant to impress a snobby dinner guest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Flying on Holiday Part 1 - The Pig family are going on vacation. Peppa and George pack their favorite toys and Granny and Grandpa are left to look after Goldie the Fish.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep611
programme.desc: The Holiday House Part 2 - Peppa and her family arrive in Italy. Everyone is talking in a different language and Daddy Pig finds driving on the right a little difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep612
programme.desc: Holiday in the Sun Part 3 - On the first day in their vacation villa, Peppa and her family go exploring in the local village.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep613
programme.desc: End of the Holiday Part 4 - Peppa has enjoyed her very first holiday abroad, but it is now time to go home. She can't wait to see Suzy and Goldie again.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Muddy Puddles - It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffl. The Barbapapas decide to go to the park.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep210
programme.desc: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge - Skye visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep211
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Mr. Ducky-Doo A Special Diving Board / The Crew Builds A Rainwater Tank - Mayor Greatway asks Rubble & Crew to build something special for her friend Mr. Ducky-Doo. But soon a construction mystery is afoot...

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep717
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bah Humdinger - Mayor Humdinger is being very naughty on Christmas Eve and it's up to the Paw Patrol to help Santa and save Christmas.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1114
programme.desc: A Jr. Patroller's Christmas - At a Christmas Eve sleepover the Jr. Patrollers are fooled into helping Mayor Humdinger steal everyone's stockings so he can get all the presents.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Private Club / Green Algae - Barbabeau, Barbabelle, and Barbabright have built a treehouse. Barbamama is determined to stop a foul pollution.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Explorer / Happy Parky / Storm - Tim explores Rumbleton to find somewhere he can have fun alone. Tim and Kai try to give Parky the best day ever. When a storm keeps the Rexes at home they must think of a game to pass the time.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep302
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Hotel Elevator / The Crew Builds A Popcorn-Cat Caf - Rubble & Crew steps in to help at Hotel Hadley after a snowy surprise. But when the stairs aren't fast enough, it's time to bow wow build!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep64
programme.desc: Picnic - The Teletubbies go on a very special picnic together. Lots of Tubby Toast pops out of the Dup Dup and lands on the picnic plates for the Teletubbies to munch.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep4
programme.desc: D - Dee encourages a friend to say 'd', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We dabble with dice, drive a digger and dance with a disco dinosaur!

programme.desc: Queen Mae-Mae - Mae-Mae is queen for the day, the rest of the friends can't wait to play in Mae-Mae's new kingdom. When she takes the game a little too far, Queen Mae-Mae tries to put things right and restore harmony in the Pop Paper City Kingdom.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC316DvalishvilivsOMalley
programme.desc: UFC 316 Countdown previews two bantamweight title fights. In the main event, mens champion Merab The Machine Dvalishvili battles Suga Sean OMalley in a rematch. In the co-main event, womens title holder Julianna Pena takes on Kayla Harrison.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 CURLING SHOTS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 CURLING SHOTS - Bend it like Dybala.. and 9 other wicked efforts that make up Serie As top 10 curlers from 22/23.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC315MuhammadvsDellaMaddalena
programme.desc: When the Octagon returns to Montreal for the first time since 2015, fans are treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena, and Manon Fiorot battles to be the first female French champion against Flyweight phenom Valentina Shevchenko. Plus, the return of Jose Aldo and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep8
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFC305DuPlessisvsAdesanya
programme.desc: UFC 305 featured the battle for the middleweight title as reigning champion Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis defended his belt against former champion Israel "The Last Stylebender" Adesanya. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC316DevalishvilivsOMalley2
programme.desc: A championship doubleheader headlines the Octagons return to the Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey for UFC 316 on June 7. In the main event, its a highly anticipated rematch when relentless force Merab Dvalishvili defends his bantamweight crown against the man he took it from, Suga Sean OMalley. Plus, the womens bantamweight title is on the line in the co-main event as Julianna Pea faces off with two-time Olympic gold medal winning judoka Kayla Harrison. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Main Event - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva
